attributes.action: Stop the incorporation of any further EU laws into British law.
attributes.additional_details: It is widely acknowledged that disentangling the UK from the Acquis communautaire will be a major task. It is perverse to make this task more complicated by continuing to implement new laws created by an organisation which we will shortly be leaving.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom will be leaving the European Union within the foreseeable future. Therefore it makes no sense for any more EU law to become British law. The government should freeze the body of EU law that applies to the UK in its current state until the negotiations are complete.
